# AI Story Writer

## Where AI Writes Stories

The supercharged AI writer for books, novels, and screenplays that writes,
edits, and visualizes your story.

Get started free

Featured at

##  AI built for writing stories.

Squibler's AI writer solves problems common and unique to every story writer.
These are just a few:  Get started free

  * AI-Assisted Writing
  * AI Elements Generation
  * AI Image Generation
  * AI Video Generation
  * Goal Tracking
  * Project Management
  * Collaboration
  * Flexible Format Download
  * Dark Mode
  * Templates
  * Split Screen

**AI-Assisted Writing**. Use our robust AI writer tool to generate story
ideas, enhance character development, write grammatically correct sentences,
overcome writer's block, and write books and screenplays with unprecedented
speed.

**AI Elements Generation**. Let our AI-powered tool assist you in crafting
your character arcs, vibrant settings, and intricate objects for your novel,
book, or script.

**AI Image Generation**. Highlight text within your draft and let our AI-
powered system transform it into images or a storyboard, enriching your story
with compelling visual elements.

**AI Video Generation**. Convert portions of your text into captivating video
sequences. Whether you're looking to visualize a scene or adapt your text into
a dynamic visual format, Squibler's AI Video Generation can bring your words
to life, offering an immersive experience for your audience.

**Goal Tracking**. Set daily and chapter-specific targets and view your
progress on our dynamic progress bar. Use our goal-tracking feature to keep an
eye on your project's milestones.

**Project Management**. Our List View provides a comprehensive snapshot of
your draft, including status, target words per chapter or act, words achieved,
and overall progress. Think of it as your personal writing project manager,
ensuring your story is crafted within the established timeline.

**Collaboration**. Form your own team, and share your work with beta readers,
editors, producers, or publishers. Squibler facilitates collaboration,
tracking, and feedback, improving the efficiency of your writing process.

**Flexible Format Download**. Download your book, novel, or screenplay in
various formats, such as PDF, Text File, MS Word, and Kindle’s mobi file
format. Save time and resources on formatting and file conversion.

**Dark Mode**. Dive deep into your story under the soothing light of our night
mode feature, reducing eye fatigue and helping you maintain focus during those
late-night writing sessions.

**Templates**. Kick-start your story structure and format using our extensive
template collection. Whether you're working on a children's book, thriller
screenplay, romance novel, or any other genre, our AI writing assistant offers
the perfect template to jumpstart your story writing.

**Split Screen**. Bid farewell to switching between chapters, acts, or
sections to gather your thoughts. With the split-screen view, you can
simultaneously view different parts of your draft, ensuring your story flows
seamlessly.

## Frequently asked questions.

Do you have questions before you begin?

What does an AI-powered story writer do?

An AI-powered story writer, like Squibler, functions as a sophisticated
writing tool that assists writers in creating their stories. It offers
suggestions, creates story elements, helps overcome writer's block by
providing prompts and new ideas, and even creates visuals for your story.
Squibler is not just an AI story generator but a comprehensive companion for
the entire writing journey.

Can AI write a book for you?

While most AI writing tools help with idea generation or enhance sections of
content, Squibler elevates this by supporting the writer's entire journey.
While it doesn't pen down a complete story autonomously, it aids in writing
fiction more efficiently, allowing authors to craft more interactive stories
much faster. Additionally, with its visualize feature, authors can bring their
narratives to life with striking visuals without the hefty expenses or the
need for design expertise.

What is the best AI story writer?

Squibler stands out in the market for its comprehensive novel writing
capabilities. It marries complex algorithms with a user-centric interface,
making it more than just an AI writing tool. Its array of features, from goal-
setting to AI-powered visualizations, positions it as a frontrunner in aiding
writers.

How much does Squibler AI story writer cost?

Squibler offers a basic free plan with limited features, including 6000 AI
words and 5 image generations per month. For a more holistic experience, the
Pro plan at $16 (billed annually) unlocks a multitude of features, such as
unlimited AI words, image generation, and advanced collaboration tools.

Is it ethical to use AI to write books and screenplays?

When artificial intelligence aids creativity and streamlines the process, as
with Squibler, it's ethical and becoming a standard in writing fiction. While
AI enhances the story, the unique voice and style of the author remain
central.

How to write a novel with Squibler?

Begin by defining your novel's theme, select a template if desired, and use
Squibler's AI to craft story elements. As the story unfolds, Squibler's
various AI-assisted features help refine and visualize the narrative, making
novel writing a seamless experience.

How does Squibler's AI work?

Using advanced machine learning, Squibler generates text that cohesively
builds upon previous chapters and the author's input. Whether it's
intensifying paragraphs, mimicking a writing style, or generating
complementary visuals, Squibler enriches your story and allows you to finish
it faster..

Does using Squibler require any writing experience?

Squibler caters to all, from novices to experts. It offers guidance on story
structure and character development for beginners, while seasoned authors can
hone their writing skills with advanced suggestions and a distraction-free
environment.

Will my story be unique if I use Squibler's AI?

Absolutely. While Squibler assists, the author's personal style and voice
direct the narrative, ensuring the story's uniqueness.

Can I collaborate with other writers while using Squibler?

Yes, Squibler encourages collaboration, allowing multiple users to jointly
craft, edit, and refine the story in real time.

How do the AI models in Squibler differ from other AI tools available for
creative writing?

Squibler's AI models are specifically tailored for authors and screenwriters,
setting them apart from generic AI tools. While many AI tools offer broad
content suggestions, Squibler's models are trained on vast literary datasets,
allowing them to provide nuanced and genre-specific needs.

Can I set a daily word count goal for myself?

Absolutely! Squibler allows writers to set a daily word count goal, ensuring
that they stay on track with their writing projects. By leveraging this
feature, writers can maintain consistency, measure their progress, and
integrate AI-generated scenes seamlessly, all while achieving their desired
narrative length and pace.
